author: Ishpreet Kaur
text:
I am so obsessed over this new song by Armaan Malik , the beauty of the song is beyond my thoughts can't get over it . 
" How your leap of faith made me put all my faith in you " 
All I do is think about is think about you ❤️!!
@ArmaanMalik22 @TeamArmaanians https://t.co/A6fG3VwZyR
